definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Therefore the algorithm can effectively control the bandwidth occupation of non-response flow.
sentences.chinese: 這將有效的控制非響應流對帶寬的佔用。

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在讀出設備之前採用低通濾波器也可以減小帶寬。

sentences.english: Typically, this is used in environments that do not require substantial network bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這種特性用於不需要大量網絡帶寬的環境。

sentences.english: But in future chips, cores’ bandwidth requirements could fluctuate wildly.
sentences.chinese: 但在未來芯片中，核心的帶寬需求會劇烈波動。

sentences.english: This section explains how the queueing system distributes any remaining bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 這節解釋了排隊系統如何分配任何剩餘帶寬。

sentences.english: Today the same is happening in everything from bandwidth to storage.
sentences.chinese: 今天，同樣的事情發生在從帶寬到存儲的各個領域。

sentences.english: Emphasis is on naming, latency, bandwidth, and synchronization in parallel machines.
sentences.chinese: 主要強調命名，等待時間，帶寬和並行機的同步化。

sentences.english: This system can utilize the transmission bandwidth more efficiently and achieve frequency diversity.
sentences.chinese: 這種系統能更有效地利用傳輸帶寬，實現頻率分集。

sentences.english: However, the idea here is to reduce bandwidth utilization.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這裏的想法是減少帶寬使用。

sentences.english: The signal with continuous phase has narrower bandwidth and higher interference-free capability.
sentences.chinese: 相位連續的移頻信號有較窄的帶寬，抗干擾性能強。

sentences.english: Limits the amount of bandwidth that is available for all unicast players connected to this publishing point.
sentences.chinese: 限制所有連接到該發佈點的單播播放機的可用帶寬量。

sentences.english: Of course, this approach does nothing to solve the bandwidth problems of the single-page approach.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這種方法沒有解決單頁面方法的帶寬問題。

sentences.english: "We're not taking up all the bandwidth waiting for acknowledgments," he says.
sentences.chinese: “我們不佔用全部帶寬等待應答，”他說。

sentences.english: The oscilloscope bandwidth set at 20MHz with co-axial probe.
sentences.chinese: 示波器帶寬設爲20兆赫茲，同軸探頭。

sentences.english: The following scripts help ensure that the bandwidth you deliver is stable and fast.
sentences.chinese: 下面這些腳本可以確保您所提供的帶寬既穩又快。
